cont.entity_a: The camera was not as described; the description did not match the actual item received.
The product arrived early and in good condition.
cont.entity_b: Camera body and lens in perfect condition.

cont.entity_a: The camera is versatile with multiple lenses and settings.
cont.entity_b: Great entry-level DSLR with a dedicated button for ISO and White Balance.

cont.entity_a: The manual is available online and the camera is compatible with Windows 10 editing software.
cont.entity_b: Compatible with 2GB or smaller SD cards.

cont.entity_a: Takes great pictures and is easy to use. Inexpensive DSLR that takes incredible shots and is fully adjustable. Clear pictures and compatibility with older lenses. Speed and picture quality are impressive. Camera is easy to use with good picture quality. Excellent for capturing moments with children due to quick photo capture.
cont.entity_b: Picture quality is great but limited to small prints due to lower megapixels. Easy to handle and takes wonderful shots. Auto focus setting is not perfect but good for the price.

cont.entity_a: Good for beginners with automatic and creative modes.
cont.entity_b: Good camera for beginners, easy to use with great picture quality. Camera is user-friendly and customizable.

cont.entity_a: The seller included an extra battery and memory card. Comes with additional used lenses that are useful for beginners.
cont.entity_b: Flash and battery not included; flash did not work.

cont.entity_a: Some cameras arrived in poor condition with missing parts and inaccurate descriptions. Issues with camera focus, flash, and busy signal. Some cameras have defective batteries and computer sync issues. Requires frequent repair for download issues. Some cameras arrived with missing or incorrect accessories. Some cameras have poor build quality and non-intuitive controls. Some cameras have flash issues in certain modes. Some cameras have rapid battery drain. Some cameras are dusty or have minor wear. Some cameras were not as advertised, with missing items or defects.
cont.entity_b: Camera stopped working after a month. Some cameras have underexposure issues. Camera did not read current memory cards. Camera arrived in good condition but stopped working after one use. Some cameras have lens and aperture issues.

cont.entity_a: The camera is a good replacement for a pocket camera and allows for additional accessories. Great camera for available light photography.
cont.entity_b: Interchangeable with most F-mount Nikon lenses. Good for beginners with a long-term skill accommodation.
